archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0188
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
As a Privacy, Fraud and Compliance Representative I want order transactions and their attributes to be recorded So that the attributes can be referred to for the purpose of early fraud detection
The following order atributes to be recorded: - First Name - Middle Name - Last Name - Email Address - IP Address - Order Number - Service Address (UUID) - Delivery Address (UUID) - Billing Addresss (UUID) - Contact Number - Date of Birth

properties.value: BSS | Fraud Detection | Record Order Attributes
is this IP address as captured during order registration or IP address of the device from which the order is registered? no MSISDN?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
